description: Try our easy to follow Prawn Red Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Red curry,Prawn,Tree nut free,Rice,Egg free,Sesame free,Easter,Dairy free
name: Prawn Red Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g large green banana prawns, peeled and deveined

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine curry paste, soy sauce, fish sauce, sugar and oil. Add prawns and stir to coat. Set aside for 30 minutes.

Heat a nonstick frying pan over medium heat. Cook the prawns, in 2 batches, for 2-3 minutes each side until golden. Transfer to a plate. Add 1/2 cup water, snow peas and spring onions to frying pan and cook for 2 minutes. Return prawns to pan. Toss to combine. Serve with rice, coriander leaves and lemon wedges.
